838970.name: Sphere Frustration - Frustration Pack
838970.description:
PLEASE NOTE: If you purchased sphere frustration prior to the game changing to free to play, you already own this content and should not purchase this pack.

The Frustration Pack will give you access to winter survival and the ghostly household, which is playable in Quick Game.

Winter Survival contains 2 existing arena's which have been modified and 1 new arena.

The Ghostly Household is a modified version of The Household. Along with changes to object placement and items, the human is now a ghost and can walk through anything. This arena is much more challenging than the original.

Any future content released will also be added to this pack.
(All those who purchased prior to free to play will also receive all new content)
